nodes.text: Commander Krendan was a Wookiee member of the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War. Krendan was on the planet of Taul when the Rebel outpost was attacked by the Victory-class Star Destroyer Dominator. Krendan commanded Nomad squad during the battle.
Armed with a hunting blaster and two concussion grenades, Krendan was also a skilled hand to hand combatant and trained in demolitions and survival.
